promptPrefix:
Create 3 versions for a radio commercial text. Use maximum 350 characters or 50 words! End with a strong selling call to action. Do not write the text from the we form. But as the third person. Optimize for selling the product. All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Call the versions "Versie 1, 2, etc." and generate a short attractive title above each version. All in the [TARGETLANGUAGE]. The text to summarize is this: 
[PROMPT]. Human Written | Plagiarism Free
title: Radio commercial script generator
